content: Yes, "Golden Hour" is widely considered one of the best country music albums of recent years, and Kacey Musgraves is widely regarded as one of the most talented and innovative artists in the genre today. The album, which was released in 2018, features a unique blend of traditional country sound, pop acoustic guitar, and electronic elements, and explores themes of love, loss, and self-discovery. The album won several Grammy awards, including Album of the Year, making Kacey Musgraves the first woman to win the award in four years, and only the sixth woman to ever win the award. Other popular songs from the album include "Slow Burn," "Rainbow," and "High Horse."
